alert.note: Alert for Eastern Dutchess; Western Dutchess (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Albany (Eastern New York and Western New England)
info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued January 05 at 10:28AM EST until January 05 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Albany
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON EST TODAY... * WHAT...Freezing rain, along with a little sleet or snow. A glaze of ice can be expected, with little to no snow accumulation. * WHERE...In Connecticut, Northern Litchfield and Southern Litchfield Counties. In New York, Western Dutchess and Eastern Dutchess Counties. In Massachusetts, Southern Berkshire County. * WHEN...Until noon EST today. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Numerous reports of icy roads and accidents have been received from the advisory area this morning.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
